## QualifierTypes.LiteralValueHierarchy.getDescendants() method

Gets all descendants of a value in the hierarchy.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDescendants(value: T): Result<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The value to get descendants for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;T\[\]&gt;

`Success` with an array of descendant values, or `Failure` if the value is not in the hierarchy.
